metadata.title: CVE-2021-36051 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
XMP Toolkit SDK version 2020.1 (and earlier) is affected by a bufferoverflow vulnerability potentially resulting in arbitrary code execution inthe context of the current user. Exploitation requires user interaction inthat a victim must open a specially-crafted .cpp file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-36051` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exempi - 2.5.1-1ubuntu0.1
libexempi8 - 2.5.1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exempi package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.1-1ubuntu0.1').
